data.title: MAHLE Group
data.text:
Arnd Franz was born in Stuttgart/Germany in 1965. 1991 University degree in Business Administration, University of Tübingen/Germany 1992—1997 Deutsche Industrie-Holding GmbH & Co. KG, Frankfurt/Germany

Controlling, later Director Finance of various subsidiaries 1997—1999 Commercial Director, TEV GmbH, Erlensee/Germany 1999—2001 Director Finance, Magna Seating Systems Europe GmbH, Lohr am Main/Germany 2001—2004 Managing Director & CFO of MAHLE Tennex North America Inc. (now MAHLE Filter Systems North America, Inc.), Murfreesboro/USA 2004—2005 Director of Controlling, MAHLE Filtersysteme GmbH, Stuttgart/Germany 2006—2012 Member of the MAHLE Management Committee

General Manager Aftermarket business unit 2013—2019 Member of the Management Board of the MAHLE Group 2019—2022 Chief Executive Officer, LKQ Europe GmbH, Zug / Schweiz
